channel.title: Comments on: Typepad to WordPress Migration

item.title: By: cordblomquist
item.dc:creator: cordblomquist
item.description: The regex queries suggested above are just some of the queries that TP2WP runs on TypePad MTIF export files. I created the TP2WP service with my friend Pete Snyder after we migrated Marginal Revolution from TypePad to WordPress. Our process first converts the MTIF file to WordPress XML and then relies on a modified version of the WordPress importer to move over file attachments such as images or MP3 files. You can check it out at http://tp2wp.com/
item.content:encoded: The regex queries suggested above are just some of the queries that TP2WP runs on TypePad MTIF export files. I created the TP2WP service with my friend Pete Snyder after we migrated Marginal Revolution from TypePad to WordPress. Our process first converts the MTIF file to WordPress XML and then relies on a modified version of the WordPress importer to move over file attachments such as images or MP3 files. You can check it out at http://tp2wp.com/

item.title: By: mimoymima
item.dc:creator: mimoymima
item.description: no problem, love the way you titled your page :D if you've been stuck on TypePad for this long and you are a legitimate blog you really do need to ESCAPE !
